context.rdfs:comment: A delivery service through which content is provided via broadcast over the air or online.
context.rdfs:label: BroadcastService

properties.rdfs:comment: The timezone in ISO 8601 format for which the service bases its broadcasts
properties.rdfs:label: broadcastTimezone

properties.rdfs:comment: The media network(s) whose content is broadcast on this station.
properties.rdfs:label: broadcastAffiliateOf

properties.rdfs:comment: A broadcast service to which the broadcast service may belong to such as regional variations of a national channel.
properties.rdfs:label: parentService

properties.rdfs:comment: The name displayed in the channel guide. For many US affiliates, it is the network name.
properties.rdfs:label: broadcastDisplayName

properties.rdfs:comment: The area within which users can expect to reach the broadcast service.
properties.rdfs:label: area

properties.rdfs:comment: The organization owning or operating the broadcast service.
properties.rdfs:label: broadcaster
